name: Darn Tough Unstandard Stripe Crew Light Cushion Socks - Unisex
categories: Unstandard Stripe Crew Light Cushion Socks
description: Step your sock style up a notch with something less standard. Fine-gauge knitting keeps these socks itch-free and lets your feet breathe. Seamless construction provides a smooth fit and ensures no slipping, no bunching and no blisters.Made of fine-gauge merino wool, nylon and Lycra® for coolness in the summer, warmth in winter.Performance fit hugs your foot to ensure no slipping, bunching or blisters.True Seamless™ construction makes them irresistibly comfortable.Darn Tough sources its wool from non-mulesed sheep.
